basic_info.description: I am Mansi Mistry, a recent graduate from Stevens Institute of Technology with a Master of Science in Computer Science, specializing in cloud computing. My journey in technology is marked by a relentless pursuit of knowledge and practical application. I have honed my skills across various languages such as Python, C++, JavaScript, and technologies including AWS, Azure, Docker, and Kubernetes.
basic_info.description2: My industry experience includes significant roles where I have led projects to optimize processes, enhance user experiences, and develop efficient systems. At Stevens, I collaborated with the Systems team to migrate student records to Workday, developed complex database queries, and automated data collection processes. During my tenure at Persistent Computer Services and The Sparks Foundation, I designed and implemented applications that resulted in significant operational cost reductions and improved user engagement. My projects reflect my ability to leverage modern technologies to solve real-world problems, from developing a live football statistics app using React.js and GraphQL to enhancing system performance with Azure Kubernetes Service. As I actively seek full-time opportunities to further hone my skills and embark on innovative projects, I invite you to explore my portfolio and witness firsthand my journey in the dynamic world of technology.

projects.title: Live Football Statistics App
description: Spearheaded in the agile development of 'AllFootball,' a React.js and GraphQL-based app providing live football league statistics.
Achieved efficient deployment of frontend and backend using Docker on Microsoft Azure, enhancing user engagement by 30%.
Utilized Kubernetes for orchestration to ensure efficient management and scaling of the application's infrastructure.

projects.title: Vehicle Identification System
description: Architected a cloud-based solution for vehicle recognition powered by YOLO v4 to deliver 80% accuracy rate.
Implemented Google Cloud Vision API to execute pre-trained models for vehicle detection and feature recognition.
Ensured robust data handling and scalability by utilizing Google Cloud Storage to efficiently store and manage results.

projects.title: Performance Enhancement with Azure Kubernetes Service
description: Implemented performance monitoring using Application Insights to provide deep insights into application health and user activities.
Established auto-scaling AKS and VM Scale Sets to efficiently handle varying loads and optimize resource utilization.
Automated performance fixes and set up proactive alerts with Azure Runbooks to improve system reliability and uptime.

projects.title: TechConf Registration Website Optimization and Migration to Azure
description: Migrated and scaled conference registration site using App Services and PostgreSQL for improved performance and reliability.
Refactored backend notifications with Azure Functions and Service Bus to cut response times and prevent HTTP timeout issues.
Conducted cost analysis and optimized resources to achieve cost-effectiveness with high performance and availability.

projects.title: Neighborly App Deployment with Azure Functions and Cosmos DB
description: Engineered community advertisement platform in Flask and Azure Functions to promote local business visibility and engagement.
Configured Cosmos DB for dynamic content management and integrated with Azure Functions for seamless data operations.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid deployment and high availability of application updates.

projects.title: Article CMS Development with Flask
description: Developed and launched a Python Flask application to enable secure article creation and management using OAuth2 with MSAL.
Enhanced robust data management and media handling using Azure SQL Server and Azure Blob Storage to boost app scalability.
Refined system reliability through comprehensive logging and proactive error handling to optimize user experience and interaction.

projects.title: Online Library Management System
description: Led launch of a PHP and MySQL-based library management system to streamline book management and transactions.
Prepared a robust backend functionality for book cataloging, borrower management, and transaction tracking.
Created user-friendly interface and responsive design for optimal user experience by utilizing Bootstrap for frontend development.

experience.company: Office of Graduate Education, Stevens Institute of Technology
experience.title: Graduate Analyst
outcomes: Collaborated with Systems team to migrate student records to Workday, optimizing data extraction and cleansing from the Slate CRM
Developed complex database queries to filter over 10,000 student applications, creating detailed reports for administrative use
Automated data collection from 50+ websites for student fairs, boosting efficiency by 80% compared to manual method
Built Python CLI application to list master's students on probation and created PowerBI dashboards to support strategic administrative decisions

experience.title: Software Engineer Trainee
outcomes: Designed and implemented Flutter-based mobile app for e-commerce using Node.js, ensuring seamless integration and robust backend
Achieved 20% operational cost reduction, 40% efficiency increase through optimized maintenance processes facilitated by Node.js

Enhanced user experience with Material Design principles and Flutter widgets, leveraging Node.js for responsive interface improvements and resolving technical issues with 30% less downtime and 25% faster processing

experience.title: Web Designing and Development Intern
outcomes: Developed dynamic blogging platform using Django and incorporated advanced user interaction features to enhance user experience

Launched platform on Microsoft Azure WebApp Service, increasing monthly active users by 20%, and implemented robust CRUD operations both blogs and user accounts to optimize functionality and user engagement
Completed code reviews, debugging sessions, and integration processes to maintain code quality and integrity

experience.company: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology
experience.title: Database Intern
outcomes: Designed ER model for student database system, created structured framework to manage incoming and current student data
Developed frontend using Java and backend with MySQL, ensuring cohesive and functional user interface and database interaction
Implemented comprehensive functionalities for managing student records which enhanced system's overall efficiency and reliability
Completed code reviews, debugging sessions, and integration processes to maintain code quality and integrity
